location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that the Governor of Bombay will have no objection to him paying the pension of Mahomed Ally Khan [Muḥammad ‘Alī Khān], son of the late Mehedy Ally Khan [Mahdī ‘Alī Khān], to his family residing at Bushire. Enclosed is a translation of the original request from Mahomed Ally Khan [Muḥammad ‘Alī Khān] to Sir Evan Nepean, Governor of Bombay, dated 27 June 1815.
